tasks.title: Setup Project Skeleton
tasks.description: Initialize Node.js + Express project structure with basic configuration and error handling.
tasks.details: Create a new Node.js project. Set up Express with basic middleware for JSON parsing, error handling, and logging. Implement a simple `/health` endpoint for testing.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify the `/health` endpoint returns a 200 status code using Supertest.

subtasks.title: Initialize Node.js Project
subtasks.description: Create a new Node.js project with npm initialization.
subtasks.details: Run 'npm init -y' to create a package.json file. Ensure Node.js is installed and set up correctly.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify package.json is created with default settings.

subtasks.title: Set Up Express with Basic Middleware
subtasks.description: Install Express and configure basic middleware for JSON parsing and logging.
subtasks.details: Install Express using 'npm install express'. Set up middleware for JSON parsing using 'express.json()' and logging using 'morgan'.
subtasks.testStrategy: Create a basic server file and verify middleware is functioning by logging requests.

tasks.expansionPrompt: Break down the setup of the Node.js project into subtasks such as initializing the project, setting up Express, configuring middleware, and implementing the `/health` endpoint.

tasks.title: Implement Database Connection and Schema
tasks.description: Set up SQLite connection using better-sqlite3 and create initial database schema.
tasks.details: Configure better-sqlite3 to connect to a local SQLite database file. Create tables for `users`, `roles`, and `user_roles` with necessary fields and constraints.
tasks.testStrategy: Write tests to ensure tables are created successfully and can be queried.

subtasks.title: Configure SQLite Connection with better-sqlite3
subtasks.description: Set up the SQLite connection using the better-sqlite3 library.
subtasks.details: Install better-sqlite3 and configure it to connect to a local SQLite database file.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify connection by executing a simple query.

subtasks.title: Create Users and Roles Tables
subtasks.description: Design and create the `users` and `roles` tables with necessary fields and constraints.
subtasks.details: Define schema for `users` and `roles` tables, including primary keys and necessary constraints.
subtasks.testStrategy: Check table creation and field constraints using test queries.

subtasks.title: Create User Roles Table and Write Schema Tests
subtasks.description: Design the `user_roles` table and write tests for schema validation.
subtasks.details: Define schema for `user_roles` table, ensuring foreign key constraints. Write tests to validate schema integrity.
subtasks.testStrategy: Run tests to ensure all tables are created correctly and constraints are enforced.

tasks.expansionPrompt: Divide the task into configuring the database connection, creating each table (`users`, `roles`, `user_roles`), and writing initial tests for schema validation.

tasks.title: Develop Authentication and User Management
tasks.description: Implement registration and login APIs with JWT authentication for Employers, Workers, and Admins.
tasks.details: Create registration endpoints for employers and workers. Implement login functionality that issues JWT tokens. Secure endpoints using JWT middleware.
tasks.testStrategy: Use Jest and Supertest to test registration and login flows, ensuring JWT tokens are issued and validated correctly.

subtasks.title: Implement Registration Endpoints
subtasks.description: Create registration endpoints for employers and workers.
subtasks.details: Develop RESTful API endpoints for user registration. Ensure data validation and error handling are in place.
subtasks.testStrategy: Use Jest and Supertest to test registration flows.

subtasks.title: Develop Login Functionality with JWT Issuance
subtasks.description: Implement login functionality that issues JWT tokens.
subtasks.details: Create login endpoints for all user types. Implement JWT token generation upon successful login.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test login flows and JWT issuance using Jest and Supertest.

subtasks.title: Secure Endpoints with JWT Middleware
subtasks.description: Secure all endpoints using JWT middleware.
subtasks.details: Implement middleware to verify JWT tokens on protected routes. Ensure unauthorized access is properly handled.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test endpoint security using invalid and expired tokens.

subtasks.title: Integrate JWT Middleware with Existing APIs
subtasks.description: Integrate JWT middleware into existing registration and login APIs.
subtasks.details: Ensure all existing APIs are protected by JWT middleware. Update API documentation accordingly.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify integration by testing all API endpoints for proper authentication.

tasks.expansionPrompt: Create subtasks for implementing registration endpoints, login functionality, JWT token issuance, and securing endpoints with middleware.

tasks.title: Implement Job Posting and Management
tasks.description: Develop CRUD APIs for job postings, allowing employers to manage job listings.
tasks.details: Create `jobs` and `job_images` tables. Implement APIs for creating, viewing, updating, and deleting jobs. Enforce business rules for job state transitions.
tasks.testStrategy: Test job creation, update, and deletion flows, ensuring business rules are enforced.

subtasks.title: Create Database Tables for Jobs and Job Images
subtasks.description: Design and create the `jobs` and `job_images` tables in the database.
subtasks.details: Define schema for `jobs` and `job_images` tables with necessary fields and constraints.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify tables are created with correct schema and constraints.

subtasks.title: Implement CRUD APIs for Job Postings
subtasks.description: Develop APIs to create, read, update, and delete job postings.
subtasks.details: Use Express.js to implement endpoints for job CRUD operations.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test each API endpoint for correct functionality and error handling.

subtasks.title: Enforce Business Rules for Job State Transitions
subtasks.description: Implement logic to enforce business rules during job state changes.
subtasks.details: Define and apply rules for valid state transitions in job lifecycle.
subtasks.testStrategy: Ensure state transitions adhere to defined business rules.

subtasks.title: Test Job Posting and Management APIs
subtasks.description: Conduct comprehensive testing of job posting and management APIs.
subtasks.details: Perform unit and integration tests to validate API functionality and business rules.
subtasks.testStrategy: Use automated tests to verify CRUD operations and state transitions.

tasks.expansionPrompt: Break down into creating tables, implementing CRUD operations, enforcing business rules, and testing each operation.

tasks.title: Develop Job Discovery and Application
tasks.description: Implement APIs for workers to discover and apply for jobs.
tasks.details: Create `job_applications` table. Implement APIs for workers to browse jobs and apply. Ensure uniqueness of applications per job and worker.
tasks.testStrategy: Test job discovery and application processes, verifying uniqueness constraints.

subtasks.title: Create `job_applications` Table
subtasks.description: Design and create the `job_applications` table in the database.
subtasks.details: Define schema for `job_applications` table including fields for job ID, worker ID, application date, and status. Ensure indexing for performance.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify table creation and data integrity with sample inserts.

subtasks.title: Implement Job Browsing and Application APIs
subtasks.description: Develop APIs for workers to browse available jobs and apply for them.
subtasks.details: Create endpoints for job listing and application submission. Ensure API handles pagination and filtering for job browsing.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test API responses for job listings and application submissions using Postman.

subtasks.title: Ensure Uniqueness of Job Applications
subtasks.description: Implement constraints to ensure each worker can apply to a job only once.
subtasks.details: Add unique constraints on `job_applications` table for job ID and worker ID combination. Handle potential conflicts in application logic.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test uniqueness by attempting duplicate applications and verifying constraint enforcement.

tasks.expansionPrompt: Divide into creating the `job_applications` table, implementing browsing and application APIs, and ensuring uniqueness constraints.

tasks.title: Implement Worker Verification via Certificates
tasks.description: Develop APIs for workers to submit certificates and for admins to verify them.
tasks.details: Create `worker_certificates` table. Implement APIs for certificate submission and admin verification. Update worker profiles based on certificate status.
tasks.testStrategy: Test certificate submission and verification processes, ensuring status updates are reflected in worker profiles.

subtasks.title: Set Up `worker_certificates` Table
subtasks.description: Create the database table for storing worker certificates.
subtasks.details: Design and create the `worker_certificates` table with fields for certificate ID, worker ID, certificate details, and status.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify table creation and field constraints.

subtasks.title: Implement Certificate Submission API
subtasks.description: Develop the API endpoint for workers to submit their certificates.
subtasks.details: Create an API endpoint that allows workers to submit certificates. Ensure data validation and secure data handling.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test API with valid and invalid certificate data.

subtasks.title: Implement Certificate Verification API
subtasks.description: Develop the API endpoint for admins to verify submitted certificates.
subtasks.details: Create an API endpoint for admins to verify certificates. Update the certificate status in the database upon verification.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test API for correct status updates and access control.

tasks.expansionPrompt: Create subtasks for setting up the `worker_certificates` table, implementing submission and verification APIs, and updating profiles based on verification status.

tasks.title: Develop Worker Selection and Job State Management
tasks.description: Implement APIs for employers to select workers and manage job states.
tasks.details: Implement APIs for employers to accept or reject worker applications. Manage job state transitions and log changes in `job_status_logs`.
tasks.testStrategy: Test worker selection and job state transitions, ensuring logs are accurate.

subtasks.title: Implement Worker Selection APIs
subtasks.description: Develop APIs for employers to accept or reject worker applications.
subtasks.details: Create endpoints for accepting and rejecting applications. Ensure proper validation and error handling.
subtasks.testStrategy: Use Jest to test API responses and error handling.

subtasks.title: Manage Job State Transitions
subtasks.description: Implement logic for managing job state transitions.
subtasks.details: Define state transition rules and implement them in the API. Ensure transitions are logged.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test state transitions using unit tests to ensure accuracy.

subtasks.title: Log Job State Changes
subtasks.description: Implement logging for job state changes in `job_status_logs`.
subtasks.details: Create logging mechanism to record state changes. Ensure logs are detailed and timestamped.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify logs are correctly recorded and accessible.

subtasks.title: Test Worker Selection and Job State Management
subtasks.description: Conduct comprehensive testing of the worker selection and job state management components.
subtasks.details: Perform integration tests to ensure all components work together seamlessly.
subtasks.testStrategy: Use integration tests to validate the entire workflow.

tasks.expansionPrompt: Break down into implementing selection APIs, managing job state transitions, logging changes, and testing each component.

tasks.title: Implement Rating and Review of Workers
tasks.description: Develop APIs for employers to rate and review workers after job completion.
tasks.details: Create `worker_reviews` table. Implement APIs for submitting reviews and calculating average ratings for workers.
tasks.testStrategy: Test review submission and rating calculations, ensuring data integrity.

subtasks.title: Create `worker_reviews` Table
subtasks.description: Design and create the `worker_reviews` table in the database.
subtasks.details: Define the schema for the `worker_reviews` table, including fields for review ID, worker ID, employer ID, rating, review text, and timestamps. Ensure proper indexing for efficient querying.
subtasks.testStrategy: Write tests to verify table creation and data insertion.

subtasks.title: Implement Review Submission API
subtasks.description: Develop the API endpoint for submitting reviews and ratings for workers.
subtasks.details: Create an API endpoint that allows employers to submit reviews and ratings for workers. Validate input data and ensure it is stored correctly in the `worker_reviews` table.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test API with valid and invalid data to ensure proper validation and storage.

tasks.expansionPrompt: Divide into creating the `worker_reviews` table, implementing review submission APIs, and calculating average ratings.

tasks.title: Develop Complaints and Admin Resolution
tasks.description: Implement complaint handling APIs for users and resolution processes for admins.
tasks.details: Create `complaints` and `complaint_evidences` tables. Implement APIs for filing complaints and for admins to resolve them.
tasks.testStrategy: Test complaint filing and resolution processes, ensuring proper status updates.

subtasks.title: Set Up Complaints and Evidences Tables
subtasks.description: Create the necessary database tables for storing complaints and related evidences.
subtasks.details: Design and create `complaints` and `complaint_evidences` tables with appropriate fields and relationships.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify table creation and field integrity.

subtasks.title: Implement Complaint Filing API
subtasks.description: Develop an API endpoint for users to file complaints.
subtasks.details: Create an endpoint to accept complaint details and store them in the `complaints` table. Ensure data validation and error handling.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test API with valid and invalid data inputs.

subtasks.title: Implement Admin Resolution API
subtasks.description: Develop an API for admins to resolve complaints.
subtasks.details: Create an endpoint for admins to update complaint status and add resolution notes. Ensure proper status transitions and logging.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test resolution process with various status updates.

tasks.expansionPrompt: Create subtasks for setting up tables, implementing complaint filing and resolution APIs, and ensuring proper status updates.

tasks.title: Implement Notifications and System Tasks
tasks.description: Develop notification system and system task APIs for job state management.
tasks.details: Create `notifications` table. Implement APIs for sending and retrieving notifications. Develop system task endpoint for managing overdue jobs.
tasks.testStrategy: Test notification delivery and system task execution, ensuring timely updates.

subtasks.title: Create Notifications Table
subtasks.description: Design and create the `notifications` table in the database.
subtasks.details: Define the schema for the `notifications` table, including fields for notification ID, user ID, message, status, and timestamps.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify table creation and data insertion.

subtasks.title: Implement Notification APIs
subtasks.description: Develop APIs for sending and retrieving notifications.
subtasks.details: Create endpoints for sending notifications to users and retrieving their notification history. Ensure proper authentication and authorization.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test API endpoints for sending and retrieving notifications, ensuring correct data handling.

subtasks.title: Develop System Task Endpoint for Job Management
subtasks.description: Create an endpoint to manage overdue jobs through system tasks.
subtasks.details: Implement logic to identify overdue jobs and trigger necessary system tasks. Ensure the endpoint can handle concurrent requests efficiently.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the endpoint's ability to manage overdue jobs and trigger tasks accurately.

tasks.expansionPrompt: Divide into creating the `notifications` table, implementing notification APIs, and developing system task endpoints for job management.
